title: True Romance
description:
Cole Kazdin, D'Arcee Neal and Asher Novek tell tales of seductive penne recipes, wheelchair sex and a high school romance turned tragic.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Doctor Rockit, Cole Kazdin, D'Arcee Neal, Ezra Furman, Asher Novek, Oh Mercy, Kevin Allison, Jeff Barr)
